mean_cn: n. 开始，发端，毕业典礼
mean_en: a ceremony during which degrees or diplomas are given to students who have graduated from a school or college
word_etyma: commence开始 + ment名词后缀 → commencement 开始，毕业典礼
sentence: Are you coming to my commencement ceremony? I'm finally done with college!
sentence_trans: 你要来参加我的毕业典礼吗？我终于毕业了！
